name: misGuided
description:
A space shooter where your bullets home in on you.

Best played in full screen (may be slow in Firefox)

Made in 48 hours for GMTK Game Jam 2020

Theme: Out of Control.

Let us know your high scores!

Controls:
WASD: Move

Mouse: Aim

Left Click: Shoot, activate homing

TIP: Try and curve your bullets around shielded enemies.

Credits:

Code and design by Charles Sharples and Jack Sharples
Art:
Sprites from Stellar Skirmish Asset Pack by KPD
Background from Dynamic Space Background by DinV Studio
Magenta Font by Florian Bambhout
Sound:
Sounds from 8-Bit Sound Effects by Beep Yeah!
